data.text: @garyruskin @CarolinaFaith2 @utmbhealth Wow, reading through their response, it's incredible how they were able to execute this letter without mentioning Covid anything to do with the actual topic!
@garyruskin @utmbhealth The “powers that be” are so #corrupt. We need to clean house and start over 😳

@g6ens We need a lot of FOIAs on those people most devoted and dedicated to deboonking lab leak. Sounds very legit that they would spend so much of their free time on here attempting to discredit something that is so easily disprovable.
@garyruskin @utmbhealth Why? If they have nothing to hide, shouldn't they be glad to share the information with the public to crash the "conspiracy theory"?
@garyruskin @utmbhealth 2 business networks, one for virus-vaccine, another for GMO crops, are the same family that has NAS. see: https://t.co/3GGAqI48YY

@g6ens @garyruskin @utmbhealth Not requests. Those end in censored documents. You need to start with FOIA lawsuits right out the gate, citing their recently released censored docs as evidence of their intent to withhold information. Time to go on the war path.
